DOC.brief_title: Contralaterally Controlled Functional Electrical Stimulation Plus Video Games Hand Therapy After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: A single-blinded randomized control trial carry assess effect 12 week Contralaterally Controlled Functional Electrical Stimulation ( CCFES ) +Hand Therapy Video Games ( HTVG ) compare CCFES . Dexterity , upper limb impairment , activity limitation assess 0 ( baseline ) , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 ( end treatment ) , 24 , 36 wks . Cortical activation ( measure fMRI ) assess 0 12 wks . The treatment dose group : 10 session per week ( 7.5 hr ) self-administered treatment home plus 2 session per week ( 3 hr ) group-specific occupational therapy lab .
